analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/8/0xac4d22e40bf0b8ef4750a99ed4e935b99a42685e.sol:
	Contract AerToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/8/0xac4d22e40bf0b8ef4750a99ed4e935b99a42685e.sol#393-395)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/8/0xac4d22e40bf0b8ef4750a99ed4e935b99a42685e.sol:
